mapper.select: select count(user_account) from t_sys_user where user_account=#{userAccount} and is_deleted=0
select count(phone) from t_sys_user where phone=#{phone} and is_deleted=0
select count(invite_code) from t_sys_store where invite_code=#{storeInviteCode} and is_deleted=0
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user ( user_code, user_account, user_name, user_pwd, id_card, sex, phone, email, role, user_image, is_deleted, create_people, create_time, update_people, update_time, version )values ( #{userId}, #{userAccount}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{idCard}, #{userSex}, #{phone}, #{email}, 3, #{userPhoto}, 0, #{createPeople}, now(), #{updatePeople}, now(), 0 )

insert into t_sys_client ( client_id, user_id, invite_code, is_deleted, create_people, create_time, update_people, update_time, version )values ( #{clientId}, #{userId}, #{storeInviteCode}, 0, #{createPeople}, now(), #{updatePeople}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select image_id slideshowId, product_id goodsId, image_url slideshowUrl from t_sys_slideshow where is_deleted=0 order by sort asc

select a.product_hot_id goodsHotId, a.product_id goodsId, b.product_name goodsName, b.price costPrice, b.price_now inPrice, b.product_image photoUrl from t_sys_product_hot a left join t_sys_product b on a.product_id=b.product_id where a.is_deleted=0 order by a.hot_sort asc LIMIT 0,#{number}

select a.product_name goodsName, a.product_idc goodsIntroduction, a.price costPrice, a.price_now inPrice, a.sale_num saleNum, a.product_image photoUrl, b.store_id storeId, b.store_name storeName from t_sys_product a, t_sys_store b, t_sys_client c where a.product_id=#{goodsId} and c.user_id=#{userId} and b.invite_code=c.invite_code
select class_id classId, class_name className from t_sys_product_class where is_deleted=0 and is_parent=0

SELECT a.class_id, a.class_name, b.product_id, b.product_name, b.price, b.price_now, b.product_image FROM t_sys_product_class a left join t_sys_product b on a.class_id=b.class_second_id WHERE a.is_deleted = 0 AND a.is_parent =1 AND a.parent_class_code=#{parentClassCode}

select a.user_name userName, a.user_image userPhoto, c.store_id storeId from t_sys_user a, t_sys_client b, t_sys_store c where user_code=#{currentUserId} and a.user_code=b.user_id and b.invite_code=c.invite_code and a.is_deleted=0 and role=3
select user_pwd userPassword from t_sys_user where user_code=#{userId} and is_deleted=0
select count(invite_code) from t_sys_store where invite_code=#{storeInviteCode} and is_deleted=0
select role role from t_sys_user where user_code=#{userId} and is_deleted=0
